hadiths.text: Narrated Al-Aswad b. Yazid:Mu'adh b. Jabal gave shares of inheritance to a sister and a daughter. He gave each of them half. He was at Yemen while the Prophet (ﷺ) was alive

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي مِيرَاثِ الصُّلْبِ
chapter.eng-name: What Has Been Related About The Inheritance For Descendants
